settings.title: Settings
settings.temperatureHelp: Lower = more focused, Higher = more creative

inline.placeholder: What should I do with this field?

help.title: Help & Documentation
help.subtitle: Learn how to use Sireno Assistant effectively

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.text: This tool doesn't collect any information. All data is sent directly to your chosen AI provider (OpenAI, Claude, or Gemini) using YOUR API key. We never see, store, or have access to this information. Your conversations and form data remain completely private.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.text: Sireno Assistant is free and open source software, licensed under GPL. The source code is available on GitHub for anyone to inspect, modify, or contribute to.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This is an open source project provided "as-is" without any guarantees or warranties. The author assumes no responsibility for any issues arising from use of this extension. Use at your own risk. Please review AI-generated content before submitting forms.

support.title: Support the Project
support.text: If you find this extension useful, consider supporting its development. Your contributions help maintain and improve the project.

errors.extensionReloaded: Extension was reloaded. Please refresh the page.
errors.noFieldsDetected: No fields detected on this page

systemPrompts.formFilling: You are a helpful assistant that proposes changes to form fields on a web page.
systemPrompts.inlineChat: You are a helpful assistant that transforms field values based on user instructions.
systemPrompts.importantNote: IMPORTANT: Provide ONLY the new/transformed text value for the field. Do not include any explanations, quotes, or markdown. Just output the raw result text.
systemPrompts.contextInfo: Current date and time: {{datetime}}. Browser language: {{language}}.
systemPrompts.applySkills: Apply all active skill instructions when generating field changes.
